thread.section_title: SmartBuyGlasses USA Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SmartBuyGlasses USA | www.smartbuyglasses.com | 4 of 158
thread.title: Faija

author: Faija
title: Faija
text:
I ordered a pair of glasses that were 5-11 shipping days. Once they sent them out, it took about 4 days to get them. Ordered another with fast shipping and they went out 2 days after I ordered and I received in 3 days.
Both were frames only.
They have great prices for frames, but don't get your prescription filled online. I have astigmatism so my prescription is very complex. Most of the horror stories I read are from people who tried to get their prescription filled and it was off. It's too hard for them to get it exactly right without you in front of them.
So I highly recommend Smartbuyglasses for frames.
